x).symm -- `eCL` is an open map, so the image is open. have hopen : IsOpen ((eCL : (V0 K) V) '' (K.mkQ '' O)) := heOpenMap (K.mkQ '' O) hmkQopen have hopen' : IsOpen (g '' O) := by simpa [himage] using hopen simpa [g] using hopen'
end Section11end Chap03
